macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 57600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: ADDRESS
macro.description: The address of the CCD100, defaults to a.

macro.name: DEV_NAME
macro.description: A user friendly name for the device, defaults to blank.
